pkgmetadata.longdescription: Color Palettes using Colormaps Node Module // Allows to generate colors from palettes defined in the colormap module of 'Node.js'. (see https://github.com/bpostlethwaite/colormap for more information). In total it provides 44 distinct palettes made from sequential and/or diverging colors. In addition to the pre defined palettes you can also specify your own set of colors. There are also scale functions that can be used with 'ggplot2'.
